title: Why are Vayne players not rushing Ruined King again?
body:
Like, rushing a crit item instead of essentials like BASE FUCKING DAMAGE sort of seems counter-intuitive, doesn't it? It's gotten to a point where most Vayne players I support end up doing poorly because they have literally no damage for long periods of the early game.

Just because Ruined King took a slight nerf to its current health damage doesn't mean it's smart to rush 30% crit on less attack speed with no base damage or life steal to sustain laning or dueling with. Where's the logic, bois?
